hero.description: I build high-impact digital experiences with modern technologies. Specialized in management systems, analytical dashboards, and scalable web platforms.

stack.subtitle: Technologies
stack.description: Tools and technologies I use to build robust and scalable solutions.

projects.subtitle: Portfolio
projects.description: Real solutions I've built, from management systems to e-commerce platforms.

voxen.title: Voxen Labs: Hybrid Analytics
voxen.description: Hybrid app (.exe) with Python backend (Tkinter, Pywebview, SQLite) and modern web dashboard. Implementation of Glassmorphism design, light/dark mode, and secure login system.

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce & Inventory Manager
ecommerce.description: Admin panel with logic for stock alerts, out-of-stock prevention, and payment validation dashboard with order status updates.

ia.title: Offline AI: Local Integration
ia.description: Configuration and deployment of speech synthesis (Qwen-TTS) and recognition (Whisper) models for local execution without external APIs, ensuring maximum privacy.

portfolio.title: React Portfolio & Tunnels (Localtunnel)
portfolio.description: Single Page Application (SPA) with React and Vite. Configuration of secure tunnels to publicly expose local server without dedicated hosting.

wordbank.title: C "Word Bank" I/O Engine
wordbank.description: Low-level processing for word occurrence counting. Mathematical memory optimization through strict file/pointer manipulation avoiding arrays/structs.

experience.subtitle: Trajectory
experience.description: My professional path and the certifications that back my skills.

policlinica.title: Technical Support / IT Specialist
policlinica.description: Equipment maintenance, network management, and support for medical area users. Optimization of response time in the internal ticket system and clinic software support.

independent.title: Independent Software Developer
independent.description: Development of hybrid desktop applications, advanced inventory and order management systems, and local integration of Artificial Intelligence models (Qwen-TTS, Whisper).

contact.subtitle: Contact
contact.description: Do you have an idea or project in mind? I'd love to hear from you.

errors.name: Name is required
errors.general: There was an error sending the message. Please try again later.

success.title: Message sent!
success.message: Thanks for contacting me. I'll respond soon.
